rules.description: Change left_command to left_control + left_option + spacebar if pressed alone
Change right_command to return_or_enter if pressed alone (rev 2)
Change caps_lock to control if pressed with other keys, to command+tab if pressed alone.
Change spacebar to left_shift. (Post spacebar if pressed alone)
Change option + d to left_option + delete_forward
Change left_shift to return_or_enter if pressed alone
Change left_shift to cmd+k if pressed alone in VSCode
Change left_option+f to cmd+shift+f+return_or_enter if pressed alone in VSCode
Change shift + delete to forward delete (rev 2)
Change mouse button 4/5 to navigate back/forward in VSCode
